name: dreamscript
description: Small programming language in JavaScript for making websites in pure CSS and HTML

scripts.build: node --experimental-sea-config sea-config.json && npx postject dreamscript.exe NODE_SEA_BLOB sea-prep.blob --sentinel-fuse NODE_SEA_FUSE_fce680ab2cc467b6e072b8b5df1996b2 --overwrite && echo done!

author: nikeedev
